meanings.definition: A hole in a garment designed for the thumb to pass through, typically found in sleeves or cuffs.
meanings.sent1: I love wearing jackets with thumbholes during winter.
meanings.sent2: Her favorite hoodie has thumbholes in the sleeves.
meanings.sent3: The thumbholes in my sweater make it easy to keep my hands warm.
meanings.sent4: The thumbholes in the gloves were like secret entrances for my thumbs.
meanings.sent5: The thumbholes in the shirt felt like cozy tunnels for my thumbs.

meanings.definition: A feature of some gloves or mittens that allows the wearer to expose their thumbs while keeping the rest of their fingers covered.
meanings.sent1: These gloves with thumbholes are perfect for using my phone in the cold.
meanings.sent2: She prefers mittens with thumbholes for extra flexibility.
meanings.sent3: I chuckled when I saw the thumbholes on those funky gloves.
meanings.sent4: The thumbholes on the mittens were like windows for my thumbs to peek out.
meanings.sent5: The thumbholes on the gloves made them stand out from the rest.
